title: Manchester United legend slams Pogba
text:
Who won Pogba vs Pogba? 1:34 Paul Pogba v Florentin Pogba: Roy Keane slams ‘a lot of nonsense’ February 17, 2017 12:28pm by Staff writers Source: FOX SPORTS FORMER Manchester United captain Roy Keane slammed Paul Pogba after displaying brotherly love towards his older sibling Florentin during United’s 3-0 victory over St Etienne. 
The Pogba brothers faced off for the first time in their Round of 32 Europa League clash , and though the Red Devils completed a comprehensive win due to Zlatan Ibrahimovic’s first hat-trick for the club , Keane was not impressed with the world’s most expensive footballer. 
Paul and Florentin interacted before, during and after the match, which the former United skipper labelled “a lot of nonsense”. 
“The boy, Pogba, he’s a bit of a free spirit, a bit of a character,” Keane told ITV. Saint-Etienne's French defender Florentin Pogba (L) and his brother Paul. Source: AFP 
“But I think it was a little bit over the top tonight - before the game and at half-time. 
“They’ve spoke more tonight than I have to any of my brothers [Keane has three siblings; Denis, Pat and Johnson] in the last five years. 
“It’s all a bit strange. I think when the game started they were focused on the game. 
“But all this stuff before and after the game, a lot of nonsense - but that’s the modern player I’m afraid.” Ibra's first United hat-trick
